h1. Authenticator and organization service configuration

An Authenticator is responsible for Identity creating [Security Service Authenticator|#Core.Security.Service]

eXo CMIS service relies on 
* authentication mechanism provided by the eXo organization service. 
* JAAS configuration of eXo Platform, e.g.
{code}
gatein-domain {
  org.exoplatform.web.security.PortalLoginModule required;
  org.exoplatform.services.security.jaas.SharedStateLoginModule required;
  org.exoplatform.services.security.j2ee.TomcatLoginModule required; 
};
{code}
